mapper.insert: insert into aim_log(type_no, member_no, content_no, content) values (#{typeNo}, #{memberNo}, #{contentNo}, concat(ifnull(#{content}, ''), (select log_comment from aim_log_type where type_no = #{typeNo})))
mapper.select: select * from aim_log where type_no=11 and member_no in (select follower_no from aim_follow where following_no=#{memberNo}) union select * from aim_log where type_no=14 and content_no in (select board_no from aim_board where member_no=#{memberNo}) union select * from aim_log where type_no=21 and content_no in (select reply_no from aim_reply where board_no in (select board_no from aim_board where member_no=#{memberNo})) union select * from aim_log where type_no=24 and content_no in (select reply_no from aim_reply where member_no=#{memberNo}) union select * from aim_log where type_no=31 and content_no=#{memberNo} order by log_no DESC;
